SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Checkpoint

java.lang.Object
cycling.Entity
cycling.Checkpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Climb, IntermediateSprint
public abstract class Checkpoint extends Entity
Abstract class for a checkpoint This class is the superclass for the subclasses IntermediateSprint and Climb
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Checkpoint

      public Checkpoint(CheckpointType type, Double location, Stage parentStage) throws InvalidLocationException, InvalidStageTypeException, InvalidStageStateException
      Constructor for the abstract superclass checkpoint. This will be called via super() in the subclasses
      Parameters:
      type - the type of checkpoint
      location - the location of the checkpoint
      parentStage - the stage that the checkpoint is in
      Throws:
      InvalidLocationException - if the location is out of range of the stage
      InvalidStageTypeException - if the stage is not of the correct type
      InvalidStageStateException - if the stage is already prepared

      public void recordTime(int riderId, LocalTime passTime)
      Record a rider's time at the checkpoint
      Parameters:
      riderId - the Id of the rider to record
      passTime - What time they crossed the checkpoint

    • getPassTime

      public LocalTime getPassTime(int riderId)
      Get time for a rider as they passed the checkpoint
      Parameters:
      riderId - the rider's ID
      Returns:
      the time that the rider reached the checkpoint

    • remove

      public void remove()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to delete the entity. Should remove the entity from any parents and delete any children.
      Specified by:
      remove in class Entity
